definitions.text: a motor vehicle with four wheels; usually propelled by an internal combustion engine
examples: he needs a car to get to work

definitions.text: a wheeled vehicle adapted to the rails of railroad
examples: three cars had jumped the rails

definitions.text: the compartment that is suspended from an airship and that carries personnel and the cargo and the power plant
where passengers ride up and down
examples: the car was on the top floor

definitions.text: a conveyance for passengers or freight on a cable railway
examples: they took a cable car to the top of the mountain
